title: Breakfast in Bed
description: "DELIGHTFULLY FUN, WITTY ROMANCE... A WRITER TO WATCH." -- BooklistFrom Romance Writers of America GOLDEN HEART AWARD-WINNING AUTHOR Robin Kaye, the third funny, sexy, contemporary romance from a fresh new voice in romance fiction.He'd be Mr. Perfect if he wasn't a perfect mess...Rich Ronaldi is almost the complete package-smart, sexy, great job-but when his girlfriend dumps him, Rich swears he'll learn to cook and clean just to win her back...She'll be happy to make him over, but not for another woman...Rich is the only guy Becca Larsen's ever met who hasn't tried to change her. She's glad to help him master the domestic arts, but she'll be damned if he'll start cooking in another woman's kitchen-or bedroom...
author: Robin Kaye
